properties.title: Bike park Leimental
properties.abstract: The bike park Leimental is located within the leisure park in Therwil. A dirt pump track with jumping elements and a single trail promise fun for the whole family.
properties.description:
The pump track made of natural soil consists of several combinable loops and contains elements that invite you to jump. 

An additional single trail was built along the terrain. It is peppered with curves, bends and waves. 

A smaller track is also suitable for children with balance bikes. The pump track is situated right next to the Robinson playground.
properties.name: Verein Bikepark Leimental
